author: donaldp
msg: When printing out exception, use reflection by default. What does this mean? It means that the util will look up method "getCause()" if it exists. The benefit of this is that jdk1.4 exceptions (that automagically use this pattern) will be supported regardless of whether they implement CascadingThrowable or not.
